game.title: The Forgotten Artifact
game.objective: Retrive the Forgotten Artifact from Ancient Ruins
game.description: Legend tells of an ancient artifact that possesses sea controlling powers. The artifact was supposedly hidden in these ruins. Your task is to retrieve it.

tasks.description: To reach the Artifact, first you must navigate through the perilous labyrinth filled with deadly traps and puzzles.
Guarding the artifact is a powerful ancient being. You must defeat it in combat to proceed.
With the guardian defeated, you can now retrieve the Artifact. Handle it with care.
